job.title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongSenior Embedded Software Engineer strongppstrongLocationstrong San Francisco Bay Area  Flexible hybrid onsiteremote scheduleppbrppOpportunity to join an innovative tech company within the Autonomous Vehicle space working on full lifecycle Software Development for the companys next generation productsppbrppAs a Senior Software Engineer you will be responsible for developing reliable C EmbeddedLinux Software to a high standard set by the company and industryppThis will involve all stages from early development of prototypes through to testing and ensuring manufacturability of the final productsppbrppThe company have some very ambitious growth plans making this a great time to join for your personal career developmentppbrppThe ideal candidate will have experience inpulliWorking in Embedded systems environmentliliExtensive CC developmentliliLinux developmentliliYocto experience is desirableliliDegree in relevant disciplineliulpYou will be working closely with the Hardware team ElectricalPCB design Engineers so a basic understanding of reading schematics and board layout would be desirableppbrppThe company offer a very competitive compensation as well as a comprehensive benefits packageppbrppIf youre looking for a new challenge and a chance to progress you skills and career further APPLY nowp
